en.ComplaintsMainHeadingHowWouldYouLikeToCo: How would you like to contact us?
en.ComplaintsMainHeadingQuote1: “We all need people who will give us feedback
en.ComplaintsSubHeadingItSeemsThatYourIssue: It seems that your issue has not been resolved yet
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel1SubmittingACom: Level 1: Submitting a complaint for the first time
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel1Paragraph1: Click here to send us an e-mail of your grievance.
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel1Paragraph2: To help us serve you better and for security of your account,
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel1Paragraph3: please mention your registered e-mail ID.
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel2YouAreNotSatis: Level 2: You are not satisfied with the first response
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel2Paragraph1: If the resolution you receive does not meet your
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel2Paragraph2: expectations, please write to Mr. Subhendu Tripathy, Head
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel2Paragraph4: Click here to raise a query/request to Senior Management.
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel3YouAreNotSatis: Level 3: You are not satisfied with the second response
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel3Paragraph1: If you are still not satisfied with the resolution you receive,
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel3Paragraph2: please write to: Mr. Vinayak M More, Principal Nodal
en.ComplaintsSubheadingLevel3Paragraph4: Click here to send an e-mail to Mr. Vinayak M More.
